thread.title: James Blunt reveals dark meaning behind 'You're Beautiful' - it's bad news for die-hard romantics
thread.title_full: James Blunt reveals dark meaning behind 'You're Beautiful' - it's bad news for die-hard romantics

author: Zahra Mulroy
title: James Blunt reveals dark meaning behind 'You're Beautiful' - it's bad news for die-hard romantics
text:
Get daily     
No one sits on the fence about what is arguably James Blunt's most famous song. 
Either you melt into mush at the first few bars of 'You're Beautiful' and pin the lyrics on your secret Pinterest wedding board. OR you hurl the radio out of the window, snarling and spitting. 
There is no middle ground. 
For those who love the song and - believe us - they exist, its lyrics epitomise romance. 
A man falls in love at first sight with a woman - what could be more romantic than that? Here's an example of the lyrics for your enjoyment. 
"My life is brilliant, my love is pure. I saw an angel, of that I'm sure. She smiled at me on the subway, she was with another man. But I won't lose no sleep on that, 'cause I've got a plan." James Blunt shatters many a couple's 'song' (Photo: The Nightly Show/Youtube) 
Admittedly, the object of the narrator's affection is not single, but unrequited or thwarted love is the stuff of epic romance - and there are plenty of people who LOVE epic romance. 
But in Blunt's own words, "These people are f up." You're Beautiful? 
In an interview which will delight those who hate the song, and forever ruin the 'first dance dreams' of those who love it, James spoke to the Huffington Post . 
Blunt by name, blunt by nature, the singer added, "Everyone goes, 'Ah, he's so romantic. I want 'You're Beautiful' as my wedding song.' These people are f up." There were different lyrics for the radio edit (Photo: REUTERS) 
It turns out fans of the song, who believe it to be the very zenith of romantic balladry, have not understood what it's about. 
Much like Sting's 'Every Breath You Take', 'You're Beautiful' has a disturbing meaning and story behind it. 
"'You're Beautiful' is not this soft romantic f song. 
"It's about a guy who's high as a f*
